title: Treasuries Pare Losses After Trump Calls for Mortgage Purchases
description: Long-dated Treasuries trimmed losses after President Donald Trump called for the purchase of $200 billion of mortgage bonds in an effort to bring down housing costs.
content: Long-dated Treasuries trimmed losses after President Donald Trump called for the purchase of $200 billion of mortgage bonds in an effort to bring down housing costs.
